meanings.sent1: The garbages were overflowing from the bin.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to separate recyclables from garbages.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the garbages were a buffet just for him.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with garbages of self-doubt.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbages lingered in the hot summer air.

meanings.definition: Worthless or nonsensical ideas or information.
meanings.sent1: Ignore the garbages people try to sell you.
meanings.sent2: His speech was full of garbages that made no sense.
meanings.sent3: She laughed at the garbages he claimed were facts.
meanings.sent4: The internet is often flooded with garbages disguised as facts.
meanings.sent5: His mind was cluttered with garbages of conspiracy theories.
